column1: Uchi////We happened on this place when visiting home/Houston and ended up really enjoying a light sushi dinner before a night out.  We were impressed at the unique rolls they had
column3: and the service was really friendly...  they went out of there way to let us sit in the best spot (we choose the actual sushi bar) and the sushi chef that ended up helping us out was awesome
column4: consulted us on the nigiri/maki that we would like
column5: and it all tasted great.  Definitely the sushi place in the area - heck we had driven in from Spring even.
